title: (NA) Plat player looking for a team
body: I'm a lb mid main but I can play everything to plat level besides support i'm a serious player and have the time to play and practice a lot. I have a passion for this game and I strive to get better every game if you're a team that isn't serious about learning/climbing don't bother me :)

replies.body: hey mate hit us up in game and lets make a team together
do you play on oce server
